coreAttributes.name: 'Pix's Playground' membership card
coreAttributes.description: A cardboard card with laminate coating, declaring the holder as being a member of the gym, 'Pix's Playground'.
coreAttributes.applyEffects: There's nothing about this card's appearance to suggest that it cost eight thousand flames. Made of flimsy cardboard, and with just a thin laminate coating to protect it from moisture, the simple design on the front leaves much to be desired. The words 'Pix's Playground', along with a basic icon of a dumbbell, are the only identifying marks which it carries.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] a closer look at the card...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(show)] off [npc.her] card to [npc2.name], who is duly impressed by [npc.her] possession of it...
